subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Defenseman Scott Niedermayer, who helped lead the Anaheim Ducks to their only Stanley Cup title in 2007, retires four months after captaining Canada’s gold medal winning team.
snippet: Defenseman Scott Niedermayer, who helped lead the Anaheim Ducks to their only Stanley Cup title in 2007, retires four months after captaining Canada’s gold medal winning team.
